subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ashton Gibbs scored 19 of his 24 points in the second half, and No. 5 Pittsburgh hung on to beat Texas, 68-66, on Friday night at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Ashton Gibbs scored 19 of his 24 points in the second half, and No. 5 Pittsburgh hung on to beat Texas, 68-66, on Friday night at Madison Square Garden.
